title: I had scored 87% in 10th so should I take science? - Quora

response.answer_text: M not demotivating you but if you are the brightest student and can maintain this in your 12 and graduation only then science will gonna help you. Or else i will suggest you to be smarter. Do commerce give your best and do bba if you are interested in H.R. field this will not require your much effort and besides this while doing your graduation do some additional courses of personality development and computers. Trust me now a days the competion is so hard that if you are at 99% only then you can take a free breathe but if you are at 95% you will be having alot of competion. But the 2nd option i told you for comerce and ending with H.R. this is what every company wants a man who can get us qualified employers and this is never ending so by doing this you will secure your future. So do let me know in the comment section what you feel. I wish you good luck.

SoI have also scored 88% in 10th so I think I can answer well.  Factors that matter in selecting stream are:- What you want to do after 12th?In which field you have interest?Ask these questions to yourself. If you want to do LLB you can take arts or commerce stream in 12th.If you want to go in medical field you have to take science stream and take biology. You can drop maths and replace it with fisheries.If you want to go for Engineering or B.sc you have to take science stream with maths subject and you can drop biology if you want.If you want to do MBA,BCA,BCCA,B.COM,Hotel Management you can take commerce stream.If you want to keep all doors open for your career or not yet decided about graduation you can take General Science.
